New Records: Zac Gallen tied his season-best with 11 strikeouts in the game.
Key Match Events: Pavin Smith hit a three-run homer in the eighth inning to extend the lead.
Pre-Game Insights: The Diamondbacks were looking to end a three-game losing streak.
Post-Match Reflections: The Diamondbacks' victory moved them closer to a wild-card spot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the final meeting between the teams in the 2024 regular season.
